To increase the chances of safely eating an apple while keeping future options open, I should move towards an apple that is closest to the current position and not immediately surrounded by other potential threats. Moving to this apple would not require the snake to leave the board or move into its own body.

Therefore, the best move for the snake at this moment is:

RIGHT

This move allows the snake to eat the apple at (9, 2) and gain a point, while also keeping the snake moving towards the top of the board, which provides more options for subsequent moves. To your future self: Continue moving towards the top of the board to maximize your chances of collecting apples while avoiding potential threats. Keep an eye on enemy movements and plan your moves strategically to ensure you stay safe and alive. Long-term strategy: Focus on reaching the top of the board to access more apples and create a path that allows for continued growth without getting trapped in tight spaces.
